title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both P1 and P2 projects are selected, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is not available.
EB: Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available when multiple projects are selected in the Navigator.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create two projects P1 and P2. 2. Select project P2 in the Navigator. 3. Attempt to close project P2 from the Navigator by using the Close Project menu item.
